name: updatePHPDocs
description: NodeJS script to recursively call the PHP site and get the description of each function and update the JSON file.
readme:
Update PHP Docs
=========
NodeJS script to recursively call the PHP site and get the description of each function and update the JSON file.

Author
------
[Adam Schodde]

Version
-------

0.0.1


Run
--------------

```sh
npm install
node main.js
```
